title: 02/18/22 DPS Hour 3  - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/18/22 DPS Hour 3  - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason talk about the L.A. Rams and why it is going to be difficult to repeat, why it's difficult to repeat for any team. Former NBA player Eddie House joins the guys to talk about the Lakers' situation with the latest Anthony Davis injury, who is the MVP right now in the league, and a look at the NBA Eastern conference and how it shakes out. Doug addresses the Twitter exchange he had with FS1's Emmanuel Acho.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
